title: Our Thing with Sammy The Bull - S2 Episode 1: KILLING PAUL, Pt. 1
description:
Salvatore "Sammy the Bull" Gravano (born March 12, 1945) is an American gangster who became the underboss of the Gambino crime family. This is his story. Directed by James Carroll.

The next hit for Sammy is within the family and the target is the boss of all bosses. Sammy plots and plans carefully, making sure every move is calculated.
